content.text:
# 2000 St. George Illawarra Dragons season

|cup_result=|cup=|coach=David Waite & Andrew Farrar|captain2=|captain=Nathan Brown|avg_attendance=14,922|assistant_coach=|year=2000}}The 2000 St. George Illawarra Dragons season was the second in the joint venture club's history. The Dragons competed in the NRL's 2000 premiership season. The team finished ninth in the regular season, missing out on finals for the first time in their history.
